content:
Dear @RalfJ and @oli

It would appear that the Miri cron job build failed. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot

Looks like macOS failed without any output:
https://github.com/rust-lang/miri/runs/2397900545?check_suite_focus=true
so I'll assume it's just macOS being unrealiable, as usual

Dear @RalfJ and @oli

It would appear that the Miri cron job build failed. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot

https://github.com/rust-lang/miri/actions/runs/769775041

build (win32)
The job was canceled because "linux64" failed.
build (win32)
The job was canceled because "linux64" failed.
build (macos)
GitHub Actions has encountered an internal error when running your job.
build (linux64)
GitHub Actions has encountered an internal error when running your job.
Yeah that seems to be it; the rerun failed on linux
(also it looks like the old link now goes to the new run?!?)
